analysis.description:
Crowdsale.Crowdsale (/unique_chucks/24/0xa90868af4a5c8bbe110d45ac8ba25330f1b7ceb5.sol#236-267) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(airdropAddress,restrictedAirdrop) (/unique_chucks/24/0xa90868af4a5c8bbe110d45ac8ba25330f1b7ceb5.sol#254)
	-token.transfer(0xA44ceA410e7D1100e05bC8CDe6C63cee947A28f7,1500000 * 1000000000000000000) (/unique_chucks/24/0xa90868af4a5c8bbe110d45ac8ba25330f1b7ceb5.sol#255-256)
	-token.transfer(0x4d044d2921e25Abda8D279d21FED919fB150F8C8,600000 * 1000000000000000000) (/unique_chucks/24/0xa90868af4a5c8bbe110d45ac8ba25330f1b7ceb5.sol#256-258)
	-token.transfer(0x076A7E0A69Da48ac928508c1ac0E9cDCeDCeE903,350000 * 1000000000000000000) (/unique_chucks/24/0xa90868af4a5c8bbe110d45ac8ba25330f1b7ceb5.sol#260-261)
	-token.transfer(0x60a7536b58ba2BEBB25165c09E39365c9d7Fb49A,800000 * 1000000000000000000) (/unique_chucks/24/0xa90868af4a5c8bbe110d45ac8ba25330f1b7ceb5.sol#261)
	-token.transfer(0x41B05379ba55954D9e1Db10fd464cEc6cA8b085D,750000 * 1000000000000000000) (/unique_chucks/24/0xa90868af4a5c8bbe110d45ac8ba25330f1b7ceb5.sol#261-267)

Crowdsale.createTokens (/unique_chucks/24/0xa90868af4a5c8bbe110d45ac8ba25330f1b7ceb5.sol#271-300) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(msg.sender,tokensWithBonus) (/unique_chucks/24/0xa90868af4a5c8bbe110d45ac8ba25330f1b7ceb5.sol#299-300)

Crowdsale.getVIATokens (/unique_chucks/24/0xa90868af4a5c8bbe110d45ac8ba25330f1b7ceb5.sol#304-309) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(restricted_address,allTokens) (/unique_chucks/24/0xa90868af4a5c8bbe110d45ac8ba25330f1b7ceb5.sol)

Crowdsale.getTeamTokens (/unique_chucks/24/0xa90868af4a5c8bbe110d45ac8ba25330f1b7ceb5.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(restricted_address,restrictedTeam) (/unique_chucks/24/0xa90868af4a5c8bbe110d45ac8ba25330f1b7ceb5.sol)

AgrolotToken.INITIAL_SUPPLY should be constant (/unique_chucks/24/0xa90868af4a5c8bbe110d45ac8ba25330f1b7ceb5.sol#194-197)
Crowdsale.minPaymentWei should be constant (/unique_chucks/24/0xa90868af4a5c8bbe110d45ac8ba25330f1b7ceb5.sol#224-226)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/24/0xa90868af4a5c8bbe110d45ac8ba25330f1b7ceb5.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/24/0xa90868af4a5c8bbe110d45ac8ba25330f1b7ceb5.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_owner' of BasicToken.balanceOf (/unique_chucks/24/0xa90868af4a5c8bbe110d45ac8ba25330f1b7ceb5.sol#83-86) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_to' of BasicToken.transfer (/unique_chucks/24/0xa90868af4a5c8bbe110d45ac8ba25330f1b7ceb5.sol#71) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_value' of BasicToken.transfer (/unique_chucks/24/0xa90868af4a5c8bbe110d45ac8ba25330f1b7ceb5.sol#71) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_owner' of StandardToken.allowance (/unique_chucks/24/0xa90868af4a5c8bbe110d45ac8ba25330f1b7ceb5.sol#142-143) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_spender' of StandardToken.allowance (/unique_chucks/24/0xa90868af4a5c8bbe110d45ac8ba25330f1b7ceb5.sol#143) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_from' of StandardToken.transferFrom (/unique_chucks/24/0xa90868af4a5c8bbe110d45ac8ba25330f1b7ceb5.sol#102) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_to' of StandardToken.transferFrom (/unique_chucks/24/0xa90868af4a5c8bbe110d45ac8ba25330f1b7ceb5.sol#102-104) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_value' of StandardToken.transferFrom (/unique_chucks/24/0xa90868af4a5c8bbe110d45ac8ba25330f1b7ceb5.sol#104) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_spender' of StandardToken.approve (/unique_chucks/24/0xa90868af4a5c8bbe110d45ac8ba25330f1b7ceb5.sol#118) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_value' of StandardToken.approve (/unique_chucks/24/0xa90868af4a5c8bbe110d45ac8ba25330f1b7ceb5.sol#118-119) is not in mixedCase
